summary: WITHOUT WARNING, THE PASSENGER SIDE FRONT SEAT ACTIVE HEAD REST DEPLOYED WITHOUT CAUSE OR CRASH.  THE VEHICLE WAS NOT MOVING, WE WERE JUST GETTING INSIDE.  THE PASSENGER SIDE HEAD REST TETHERED TO THE SEAT SUDDENLY AND UNEXPECTEDLY DEPLOYED CAUSING DAMAGE TO THE HEAD REST. NO VISIBLE DAMAGE IS APPARENT TO THE VEHICLE ITSELF (CRASH), AND NO VISIBLE CODES OR WARNING LIGHTS (I.E. AIRBAG LIGHT) ARE DISPLAYED. THE VEHICLE HAS NEVER BEEN IN AN ACCIDENT.
